data.text: @JimmySecUK He was always very dogmatic, but he often made some very good points. He was great at calling out conservative Islam for what it was. The trump thing, I got. Message was to ignore those contesting it at our peril. Fair enough. He now seems to have lost it. It’s quite sad.
@AndrewOnSeeAIR @majugipoo @JimmySecUK Me too! Chicken shit. It’s just lil ole me😇
@HoratioNelson0 @neilhayden @JimmySecUK @Opdiner He was never a terrorist, let’s be clear. An extremist, certainly.
@Halalcoholism @neilhayden @JimmySecUK @Opdiner He was an active Islamic terrorist.  So no matter how reformed you become the wiring has to be faulty to begin with.
@JimmySecUK The best thing LBC did was sack him.
@MelisandreBara1 @JimmySecUK He also calls it (?) the "Russia Hoax".
@AndrewOnSeeAIR @JimmySecUK His link to the Trump impeachment is probably one of the reasons MAGAjid is anti Ukraine 😳
@JimmySecUK @nath4nglx From de-radicalized islamist to radicalized far right conspiracy reactionary, he just can't help him self.

@mansi_1612 @JimmySecUK Yeah he's a massive hypocrite as well as a crank.

On a separate note I was just thinking about this hilarious exchange where he was utterly humiliated a couple of years back. Obviously his replies were deleted but I saved it a while back https://t.co/KjvzGBwJhZ
@Jimmy77363898 @JimmySecUK Why am I not surprised? Demands answers to questions and free speech until the questions are uncomfortable.
